creator: tijmen@vangulik.org
text:
I Downloaded Tomcat 3.2.2. After altering the httpd.conf apache can not find 
the ApacheModuleJServ.dll. This dll is not in the download section of Tomcat 
3.2.2 but in the download section of Tomcat 3.2.1. This is rather confusing for 
a first time user and I am not sure if the dll of the 3.2.1 version can be used 
for tomcat 3.2.2.
Reassigning to Marc since he was the release manager.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: We'll try to include it in future releases.
